Just another Frankenbox gone wrong. It's a random number generator  dri=
ving 
the speakjet chip. The chip is reset by an antenna wire, it announces=
  
"ready" when reset. So I try to start recording when I get the "ready". =
The  RNG 
is just the first half of the random sweep generator. 
 
 F-S
